data.text: @ArkyJason Well Jason you forgot something we the taxpayers funded covid that's right we did as always I see through the BS that's flying through the clouds why was I not surprised that this was an American Finance virus outsource to the Chinese who screwed up the safety protocols did they?

@ArkyJason And what is your point? Covid is releasing its grip on the country and the government is responding. Whether it be Democrats or Republicans both parties are going to take responsibility for the improvements and blame the other for everything thing bad.
@ArkyJason I love how you just tell the truth! The media needs more of you. Thank you.
